page.title: 04Recreation
page.content: to the public.It is now open every day execept friday,there is an over fortys lesson on wednsdays at the moment 12 staff are needed to keep the centre open and there are several courses such as karate club,badminton club, swimming club and gym club.There are 8 tennis courts which are out side and they are open in the summer months. There are 2 sqush courts with a viewing gallery.The gymnasium is only for club and group use and there is a weight lifting gym and this is not open to the public yet. In the week the centre is open from 6pm to 9pm,on saturday it is open from 10am to 5.30 pm and after that there is a club.On sunday it is open from 9am to 5.10pm and like saturday there is also a club for the rest of the evening.
